slopScan.summary: 26 {{template}} placeholders in preflight.ts (intentional templating system). No hallucinated deps or phantom imports. 3 TODO/FIXME references in production code.

testQuality.summary: 38 tests with zero assertions. Stress tests run without verifying anything. Hardcoded dates will rot.

mutationKill.summary: 6.7-13.3% kill rate across two independent runs. Security functions completely unprotected. Business logic mutations all survived.

findings: CRITICAL: command injection in scope.ts (execSync with unsanitized projectPath)
CRITICAL: command injection in scope.ts (git ls-tree with unsanitized commit hash)
CRITICAL: command injection in pilot.ts (spawn claude with user-controlled prompt)
HIGH: command injection in pilot.ts (pgrep shell command)
HIGH: path traversal bypass in security.ts sanitizePath (absolute paths)
HIGH: MCP tool arguments unvalidated in server.ts wrapTool
MEDIUM: hardcoded GitHub OAuth client ID in auth.ts
MEDIUM: child process inherits full env in pilot.ts
MEDIUM: silent scan failures in vuln-scan.ts
security.summary: 3 critical command injection vulns. sanitizePath bypassable with absolute paths. MCP tool handlers lack input validation.
